languages.text: "Их мутации вызывают утрату кожного пигмента и выпадение волос. У некоторых на глазу начало формироваться рептильное третье веко либо зафиксирована прогрессирующая атрофия гортани, препятствующая членораздельной речи. При этом их сухожилия становятся эластичнее и плотнее, что обеспечивает выносливость и стойкость к нагрузкам".

"Their mutations cause the loss of skin pigment and the shedding of hair. Some have started developing a translucent third eyelid similar to that of reptiles, others have succumbed to progressive atrophy of the larynx, causing the loss of human speech. At the same time their tendons become denser and more elastic, providing increased endurance and load resistance."
languages.original_text: "Их мутации вызывают утрату кожного пигмента и выпадение волос. У некоторых на глазу начало формироваться рептильное третье веко либо зафиксирована прогрессирующая атрофия гортани, препятствующая членораздельной речи. При этом их сухожилия становятся эластичнее и плотнее, что обеспечивает выносливость и стойкость к нагрузкам".

traits.locale_text: "Their mutations cause loss of skin pigment and shedding of hair. The eyes of some have started developing a nictitating membrane similar to that of reptiles, others succumbed to progressive atrophy of the larynx causing the loss of human speech. At the same time their tendons became denser and more elastic, providing increased endurance and tearing strength."

"Their mutations cause loss of skin pigment and shedding of hair. The eyes of some have started developing a nictitating membrane similar to that of reptiles, others succumbed to progressive atrophy of the larynx causing the loss of human speech. At the same time their tendons became denser and more elastic, providing increased endurance and tearing strength."

At the same time their tendons become denser and more elastic, providing increased endurance and load resistance."

At the same time their tendons become denser and more elastic, providing increased endurance and load resistance."

At the same time their tendons become denser and more elastic, providing increased endurance and load resistance."

languages.text: «Las mutaciones causan pérdida de cabello y de pigmentación cutánea. Los ojos de algunos han empezado a desarrollar una membrana nictitante como la de los reptiles, mientras que otros sufren atrofia de la laringe, lo que les ocasiona la pérdida del habla humana. Al mismo tiempo, sus tendones se han vuelto más densos y elásticos, ofreciendo mayor resistencia y capacidad de carga».
languages.original_text: "Their mutations cause the loss of skin pigment and the shedding of hair. The eyes of some have started developing a nictitating membrane similar to that of reptiles, others succumbed to progressive atrophy of the larynx, causing the loss of human speech. At the same time their tendons became denser and more elastic, providing increased endurance and load resistance."

traits.locale_text: «Las mutaciones causan pérdida de cabello y de pigmentación cutánea. Los ojos de algunos han empezado a desarrollar una membrana nictitante como la de los reptiles, mientras que otros sufren atrofia de la laringe, lo que les ocasiona la pérdida del habla humana. Al mismo tiempo, sus tendones se han vuelto más densos y elásticos, ofreciendo mayor resistencia y capacidad de carga».

languages.text: « Leurs mutations occasionnent une dépigmentation de la peau et la chute des cheveux. Les yeux de certains ont développé une membrane nictitante, comme chez les reptiles, tandis que d'autres souffrent d'une atrophie progressive du larynx et deviennent incapables d'employer un langage humain. D'un autre côté, leurs tendons ont gagné en densité et en élasticité, ce qui les rend plus endurants et aptes à porter de lourdes charges. »
languages.original_text: "Their mutations cause the loss of skin pigment and the shedding of hair. The eyes of some have started developing a nictitating membrane similar to that of reptiles, others succumbed to progressive atrophy of the larynx, causing the loss of human speech. At the same time their tendons became denser and more elastic, providing increased endurance and load resistance."

traits.locale_text: « Leurs mutations occasionnent une dépigmentation de la peau et la chute des cheveux. Les yeux de certains ont développé une membrane nictitante, comme chez les reptiles, tandis que d'autres souffrent d'une atrophie progressive du larynx et deviennent incapables d'employer un langage humain. D'un autre côté, leurs tendons ont gagné en densité et en élasticité, ce qui les rend plus endurants et aptes à porter de lourdes charges. »

languages.text: “这种突变会导致皮肤色素缺失以及毛发脱落。一部分人的眼睛长出了类似爬行动物的瞬膜，而另一些人的喉部逐渐萎缩，最终失去了人类的语言能力。与此同时，他们的肌腱变得更加致密、富有弹性，耐力与韧性也有了显著提高。”
languages.original_text: "Their mutations cause the loss of skin pigment and the shedding of hair. The eyes of some have started developing a nictitating membrane similar to that of reptiles, others succumbed to progressive atrophy of the larynx, causing the loss of human speech. At the same time their tendons became denser and more elastic, providing increased endurance and load resistance."

traits.locale_text: “这种突变会导致皮肤色素缺失以及毛发脱落。一部分人的眼睛长出了类似爬行动物的瞬膜，而另一些人的喉部逐渐萎缩，最终失去了人类的语言能力。与此同时，他们的肌腱变得更加致密、富有弹性，耐力与韧性也有了显著提高。”

languages.text: 「突然変異によって皮膚の色素が失われ、毛が抜け落ちます。一部の目は爬虫類のような鼻孔膜を発達させ、中には喉頭の萎縮が進行することによって言葉を失う者もいます。同時に、腱がより緻密かつ弾力的なものとなり、持久力と耐荷重性が向上します」
languages.original_text: "Their mutations cause the loss of skin pigment and the shedding of hair. The eyes of some have started developing a nictitating membrane similar to that of reptiles, others succumbed to progressive atrophy of the larynx, causing the loss of human speech. At the same time their tendons became denser and more elastic, providing increased endurance and load resistance."

traits.locale_text: 「突然変異によって皮膚の色素が失われ、毛が抜け落ちます。一部の目は爬虫類のような鼻孔膜を発達させ、中には喉頭の萎縮が進行することによって言葉を失う者もいます。同時に、腱がより緻密かつ弾力的なものとなり、持久力と耐荷重性が向上します」

languages.text: "Ihre Mutationen führen zum Verlust der Hautpigmentierung und zu schwerem Haarausfall. Bei einigen haben die Augen eine Nickhaut entwickelt, wie Reptilien sie besitzen, bei anderen kam es zu einer fortschreitenden Atrophierung des Kehlkopfs, so dass sie des Sprechens nicht mehr mächtig sind. Gleichzeitig wurden ihre Sehnen dichter und elastischer, was ihnen mehr Ausdauer verleiht und sie belastbarer macht."
languages.original_text: "Their mutations cause the loss of skin pigment and the shedding of hair. The eyes of some have started developing a nictitating membrane similar to that of reptiles, others succumbed to progressive atrophy of the larynx, causing the loss of human speech. At the same time their tendons became denser and more elastic, providing increased endurance and load resistance."

traits.locale_text: "Ihre Mutationen führen zum Verlust der Hautpigmentierung und zu schwerem Haarausfall. Bei einigen haben die Augen eine Nickhaut entwickelt, wie Reptilien sie besitzen, bei anderen kam es zu einer fortschreitenden Atrophierung des Kehlkopfs, so dass sie des Sprechens nicht mehr mächtig sind. Gleichzeitig wurden ihre Sehnen dichter und elastischer, was ihnen mehr Ausdauer verleiht und sie belastbarer macht."

languages.text: "Mutasyoları, deride pigment kaybına ve saç dökülmesine neden oluyor. Bazıları; sürüngenlere benzer şekilde, saydam, üçüncü bir göz kapağı geliştirmeye başladı. Diğerleri, insan dilinde konuşma yetilerini kaybetmelerine neden olan ileri seviye gırtlak körelmesine yenik düştü. Aynı zamanda tendonları daha yoğun ve esnek hâle geldi. Bu sayede dayanıklılıkları arttı ve büyük miktarda direnç kazandılar."
languages.original_text: "Their mutations cause the loss of skin pigment and the shedding of hair. Some have started developing a translucent third eyelid similar to that of reptiles, others have succumbed to progressive atrophy of the larynx, causing the loss of human speech. At the same time their tendons become denser and more elastic, providing increased endurance and load resistance."

traits.locale_text: "Mutasyoları, deride pigment kaybına ve saç dökülmesine neden oluyor. Bazıları; sürüngenlere benzer şekilde, saydam, üçüncü bir göz kapağı geliştirmeye başladı. Diğerleri, insan dilinde konuşma yetilerini kaybetmelerine neden olan ileri seviye gırtlak körelmesine yenik düştü. Aynı zamanda tendonları daha yoğun ve esnek hâle geldi. Bu sayede dayanıklılıkları arttı ve büyük miktarda direnç kazandılar."
